field[source]

field(color='white', figsize=None, ax=None, show=True)

Plot football pitch in different colors

Parameters

color: str Current options are white or green figsize: int figure size in inches ax: matplotlib.axis the matplotlib.axis to update show: bool Should we call the .show() method on the created plot.

Returns

matplotlib.axis The pitch attached to a matplotlib.axis
